text: Super long waiting time despite not many people. Would not recommend here if you needed attention right away. Reception staff was very nice and patient though

Dr Ting Fang Ni is very good and patient, my kid has rash and itchy skin here and there. She was very patient, explained to all my questions. And my kid has some reaction to the medicine prescribed, the clinic managed us to see the same doctor in NUH. now my kid skin is good already! Good service and good doctor!

Needed to see doctor cause our kid suddenly had very bad coughing on Friday afternoon

Tried to make appointment on the app but takes 2 or 3 days to process. Had to walk in cause number was taking forever to reach them.

Walked in at the clinic and they didn’t give us a number straightaway as they needed to check with the doctor. Eventually was chased away to another clinic with the reason “I checked with my doctor, one has a meeting and the other one is quite packed, the waiting time is 2hours. Would you like to go to UCC at Bukit Panjang?”

I asked if they knew if the queue was shorter there and they told me they didn’t know. I called and check and the waiting time there was also 2 hours.

So basically they chased us away to another clinic that is equally long.

Didn’t expect such service by a public hospital.
